backend/main.mo: Motoko actor with a single healthCheck query function that returns a status message confirming the backend is running.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three high-confidence features for edit/delete patient actions in PatientListPanel with touch-friendly iPad interaction.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including components, utilities, state management, and storage layers with implementation details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, including clinical white and soft teal palette definitions.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, title 'Aspen Clinic Snap', and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing PIN lock state, auto-lock timeout, database migrations, data loading, and conditional rendering of PinLockScreen or ClinicalSnapShell.
frontend/src/components/camera/CameraAli: Visual-only overlay component rendering rule-of-thirds grid, center crosshair, and corner markers with pointer-events-none to avoid blocking camera controls.
frontend/src/components/camera/CameraCap: Full-screen camera capture interface with iPad-hardened initialization, constraint fallback logic, alignment guides, ghost overlay, view template selection, and fallback system camera button with diagnostics.
frontend/src/components/camera/CameraFli: Button component for toggling between front and back camera with clear labeling, loading state, and touch-friendly sizing.
frontend/src/components/camera/CameraOpt: Reusable camera options UI with toggles for alignment guides, ghost overlay with opacity slider, and view template selection dropdown.
frontend/src/components/camera/FallbackC: A fallback button component that triggers the system file picker for image capture when native camera access is unavailable, with file validation and error handling.
frontend/src/components/camera/GhostOver: A dialog component for selecting a reference photo from the current session to use as a ghost overlay for alignment, displaying photos in a grid with selection state.
frontend/src/components/layout/ClinicalS: Main application shell with resizable panels for patient list and session timeline, managing overlays for camera capture, voice memos, photo viewer, and before/after comparison.
frontend/src/components/patients/Patient: An alert dialog component that confirms patient deletion with a warning about permanent data removal.
A dialog form for creating or editing patient records with fields for name, patient ID, date of birth, and treatment history.
A panel displaying a searchable, scrollable list of patients with CRUD operations including edit and delete buttons, sorted by most recent update.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoAnno: A canvas overlay component for drawing and displaying photo annotations including pen strokes, highlights, text, and stamps (arrows, margin lines, prep lines).
Annotation toolbar component providing pen, highlight, text, and stamp tools with color/size controls, plus undo and clear-all actions for photo annotations.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoThum: Grid display of photo thumbnails for a session with view template badges and dropdown menu for viewing, editing templates, and deleting photos.
frontend/src/components/photos/PhotoView: Full-screen photo viewer overlay with zoom/pan controls, annotation mode toggle, view template display/editing, and annotation canvas integration.
frontend/src/components/photos/SessionPh: Photo import button with file input handling, iPad compatibility, cancellation detection, and view template selection dialog for imported photos.
frontend/src/components/photos/ViewTempl: Reusable dialog component for selecting or removing view templates from photos with save/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/security/PinLock: PIN entry lock screen with numeric keypad, input validation, and unlock verification for app security.
frontend/src/components/sessions/Session: Alert dialog component that prompts the user to confirm deletion of a session, warning that all photos, pairings, and voice memos will be permanently removed.
Dialog component for creating or editing a session with fields for title, date, and multi-select treatment type checkboxes. Handles session creation and updates via the app store.
frontend/src/components/settings/AboutLo: Informational component displaying app branding, a privacy notice emphasizing local-only storage, and a footer with attribution to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/settings/Brandin: Settings panel for configuring clinic name and logo (default or custom upload) with live preview and save functionality.
frontend/src/components/settings/Privacy: Settings panel for enabling PIN lock, setting/changing PIN, and configuring auto-lock timeout with validation and secure PIN hashing.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Side sheet component with tabbed interface for accessing branding, privacy, treatment types, and about settings panels.
frontend/src/components/settings/Treatme: Management interface for creating, editing, and deleting treatment types with name and color properties, displayed in a scrollable list with action buttons.
frontend/src/components/viewer/BeforeAft: Dialog component for selecting and comparing before/after photos with slider and overlay modes, plus fullscreen view option.
Full-screen overlay component for before/after photo comparison with slider and opacity-controlled overlay modes.
Touch-friendly swipe-reveal slider component for before/after photo comparison using pointer events and clip-path.
frontend/src/components/viewer/SessionTi: Panel displaying patient sessions in timeline format with photo grids and action buttons for camera, voice memos, photo import, and before/after comparison.
frontend/src/components/voice/FallbackVo: Fallback audio capture button using file picker for iPad Safari compatibility, with MIME type detection and duration estimation.
frontend/src/components/voice/VoiceMemoP: Sheet panel for recording, playing, and managing voice memos with error handling, fallback capture option, and separate audio players for pending and saved recordings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioPlayer.ts: React hook for audio playback with MIME type support, play/pause/stop controls, error handling, and automatic cleanup on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validity with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/usePanZoom.ts: React hook providing touch-friendly pan and zoom functionality for images with pinch-to-zoom, wheel zoom, and drag support.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with clinical-themed color palette (soft teal/white), touch-friendly utilities for large targets, camera preview container styles, and dark mode support.
frontend/src/lib/export/sessionPdfExport: Empty file for session PDF export functionality.
frontend/src/lib/media/audioMemo.ts: Audio recording utility class with MIME type detection, permission handling, error categorization, and duration tracking for creating audio memos.
frontend/src/lib/media/cameraDiagnostics: Structured diagnostic logging system for camera and import operations that categorizes errors and explicitly prohibits logging patient/session IDs or media content.
frontend/src/lib/media/cameraPreviewVali: Validates video preview readiness by checking dimensions, readyState, frame advancement, and element visibility with timeout handling, specifically addressing iPad Safari black screen issues.
frontend/src/lib/media/photoStorage.ts: Handles photo capture from file input with validation, image decoding, thumbnail generation, and comprehensive error handling with user-friendly messages for iPad Safari compatibility.
frontend/src/lib/models.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for all domain models (Patient, Session, Photo, Annotation, BeforeAfterPairing, TreatmentType, VoiceMemo, Settings) with default treatment types and view templates, including multi-treatment support.
frontend/src/lib/search/filtering.ts: Provides search and filter utilities for patients and sessions by query text, treatment type names/IDs, and date ranges with support for multi-treatment sessions.
frontend/src/lib/security/pinLock.ts: Implements PIN hashing with SHA-256, verification, and auto-lock manager that triggers lock after configurable inactivity timeout with user activity detection.
frontend/src/lib/state/useAppStore.ts: Zustand store managing global app state with CRUD actions for all entities (patients, sessions, photos, annotations, pairings, treatment types, voice memos, settings) and immediate state updates after IndexedDB writes.
frontend/src/lib/storage/indexedDb.ts: IndexedDB wrapper providing persistence layer with schema definition, initialization, upgrade handling, and generic CRUD operations for all clinical data with indexes on foreign keys.
frontend/src/lib/storage/migrations.ts: Handles IndexedDB schema migrations including initializing default treatment types and settings on first run, migrating sessions to support multiple treatment types, and backfilling MIME types for voice memos.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an iPad clinical photography app for dental/aesthetic clinics with patient profiles, session-based photo organization, before/after comparisons, and on-device privacy; lists known issues including broken session addition, missing annotations, and scroll/pagination problems.
